sentences.sentence: Rescue workers have found the body of a 31-year-old woman after a devastating landslide swept through the Italian island of Ischia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least 10 people are still missing, and one woman has been confirmed dead after a landslide swept through the Italian island of Ischia early Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: early Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Two people were rescued from a car that was carried out into sea, and one house was reportedly buried.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We are afraid there might be other victims, but so far the current toll is one dead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The body of a woman was found by our teams, but so far, nobody else." Strong winds and heavy rain have been hampering search operations and making it harder to get reinforcements ferried over from the mainland. At least 30 families are reportedly still trapped in their homes without water or electricity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In a bid to deliver to Africa's poorest countries, the initiative hopes to reignite grain exports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Following major disruptions of shipments of Ukrainian grain worldwide due to Russia's invasion of the country, the summit was launched in the presence of political leaders from Poland, Lithuania, Hungary and Belgium.

sentences.sentence: Ukraine will fulfill its export obligations regarding the supply of grain and other agricultural products to the world market. Ukraine is fighting for our life and fighting for the life of other nations so that they be free of slavery and hunger.

sentences.sentence: Hungary's teachers' unions have filed a petition to the Ministry of the Interior demanding the government urgently reforms the education system and raises teachers' salaries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Teachers' parents and students have been demonstrating for months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After filing the petition on Saturday, thousands marched to the Parliament.

sentences.sentence: Freedom of education, an independent Ministry of Education and most of all a salary rise, because there will be no young people who would take our place and continue teaching.

sentences.sentence: It's a hot pile of mess as it is.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
